articles.title: US opens safety probe into complaints from Tesla drivers that they can lose steering control
articles.description: This time the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is looking into a dozen complaints about loss of steering control or loss of power steering in the 2023 Models 3 and Y electric vehicles.
